title: 12/11 BONUS: Week 15 DFS Podcast (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
It's DFS episode time! Heath is joined by SportsLine's Mike McClure to break down the DFS slate for Week 15. Who is our favorite minimum price injury replacement WR: Hurns, Watson, Perriman or someone else (5:36)? A review of the highest Vegas implied totals makes the 49ers & Chiefs weapons very attractive (7:58). Next we discuss our favorite team and two player stacks (9:27). Then we break down the matchups that matter for the slate, going from QBs all the way to DSTs (13:43). We finish off with LET'S GET WEIRD, picking one off the wall play at every position (23:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Need some DFS advice for Week 15? Our experts Heath Cummings and Mike McClure tell you everything you need to know.
